scripts.build: npm run css-compile && npm run js-compile
scripts.js-compile:
cd .\assets\js\ && npx terser ..\..
ode_modules\photoswipe\dist\photoswipe.js ..\..
ode_modules\photoswipe\dist\photoswipe-ui-default.js ..\dev\js\main.js ..\dev\js
avbar.js ..\dev\js\gallery.js --compress --mangle reserved=['css'] --toplevel --source-map url='app.js.map' --output app.js
scripts.watch-css: npx nodemon --watch assets/dev/scss/ --ext scss --exec "npm run css-compile"
scripts.watch-js: npx nodemon --watch assets/dev/js/ --ext js --exec "npm run js-compile"
